content: materials - 2 skeins of purl soho s mulberry merino 1 80% extra fine merino wool 20% mulberry silk each skein is 247 yards/ 100 grams approximately 350 yards required we used the color pale stone - a set of us 2 3 mm double pointed needles 3 - two different colored stitch markers 4 or pieces of scrap yarn gauge 24 stitches and 64 row = 4 inches in fisherman s rib pattern unstretched size to fit most women and some men - finished circumference around cuff and palm 6 ½ inches comfortably stretching to 8 inches - finished length from cuff to top 11 inches adjustable 1 https //www purlsoho com/mulberry-merino 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=969 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--double_pointed_needles html 4 https //www purlsoho com/locking-stitch-markers html
